name: Snow Shapers
description:
Snow Shapers is an entry for Weekly Game Jam #204 by rcorre and organicpencil.

You control the terrain rather than the snowboarders! Left-Click raises terrain, Right-Click lowers it. Gather as many coins as you can. You lose when all your snowboarders are knocked out. Good luck!
